title.text: RFC 2422:  Toll Quality Voice - 32 kbit/s ADPCM MIME Sub-type Registration

contents.text:
Network Working Group                                         G. Vaudreuil
Request for Comments: 2422                             Lucent Technologies
Obsoletes: 1911                                                 G. Parsons
Category: Standards Track                                 Northern Telecom
                                                            September 1998
Toll Quality Voice - 32 kbit/s ADPCM MIME Sub-type Registration
contents.zh-CHS: 收费质量语音-32 kbit/s ADPCM MIME子类型注册

contents.text: Status of this Memo
contents.zh-CHS: 本备忘录的状况

contents.text: This document specifies an Internet standards track protocol for the Internet community, and requests discussion and suggestions for improvements. Please refer to the current edition of the "Internet Official Protocol Standards" (STD 1) for the standardization state and status of this protocol. Distribution of this memo is unlimited.
contents.zh-CHS: 本文件规定了互联网社区的互联网标准跟踪协议，并要求进行讨论和提出改进建议。有关本协议的标准化状态和状态，请参考当前版本的“互联网官方协议标准”（STD 1）。本备忘录的分发不受限制。

contents.text: Copyright Notice
contents.zh-CHS: 版权公告

contents.text: Copyright (C) The Internet Society (1998). All Rights Reserved.
contents.zh-CHS: 版权所有（C）互联网协会（1998年）。版权所有。

contents.text: Overview
contents.zh-CHS: 概述

contents.text: This document describes the registration of the MIME sub-type audio/32KADPCM for toll quality audio. This audio encoding is defined by the ITU-T in Recommendation G.726.
contents.zh-CHS: 本文档描述了为toll quality audio注册MIME子类型audio/32KADPCM。该音频编码由ITU-T在建议G.726中定义。

contents.text: 1. Abstract
contents.zh-CHS: 1. 摘要

contents.text: This document describes the registration of the MIME sub-type audio/32KADPCM for toll quality audio. This audio encoding is defined by the ITU-T in Recommendation G.726. This document refines an earlier sub-type registration in RFC 1911.
contents.zh-CHS: 本文档描述了为toll quality audio注册MIME子类型audio/32KADPCM。该音频编码由ITU-T在建议G.726中定义。本文件细化了RFC 1911中早期的子类型注册。

contents.text: The key words "MUST", "MUST NOT", "REQUIRED", "SHALL", "SHALL NOT", "SHOULD", "SHOULD NOT", "RECOMMENDED", "MAY", and "OPTIONAL" in this document are to be interpreted as described in [REQ].
contents.zh-CHS: 本文件中的关键词“必须”、“不得”、“要求”、“应”、“不应”、“应”、“不应”、“建议”、“可”和“可选”应按照[REQ]中的说明进行解释。

contents.text: 2. ITU-T Definition
contents.zh-CHS: 2. ITU-T定义

contents.text: Recommendation G.726 [G726] defines the characteristics that are recommended for the conversion of a 64 kbit/s A-law or m-law pulse code modulation (PCM) channel at 8000 samples/second to and from a 40, 32, 24 or 16 kbit/s channel. The conversion is applied to the PCM
contents.zh-CHS: 建议G.726[G726]定义了建议以8000个采样/秒的速度将64 kbit/s a律或m律脉冲编码调制（PCM）信道转换为40、32、24或16 kbit/s信道的特性。转换应用于PCM

contents.text: bit stream using an adaptive differential pulse code modulation (ADPCM) transcoding technique. This Recommendation obsoletes G.721 which only defined the 32 kbit/s characteristics.
contents.zh-CHS: 采用自适应差分脉冲编码调制（ADPCM）转码技术的比特流。本建议废除了仅定义32 kbit/s特性的G.721。

contents.text: Recommendation G.726 was prepared by Study Group 15 of the Telecommunications Standardization Sector of the International Telecommunication Union (ITU-T) and was approved under the ITU's Resolution No. 2 procedure on the 14 of December 1990.
contents.zh-CHS: 建议G.726由国际电信联盟（ITU-T）电信标准化部门第15研究组编写，并于1990年12月14日根据ITU第2号决议程序获得批准。

contents.text: 3. MIME Definition
contents.zh-CHS: 3. MIME定义

contents.text: 3.1 audio/32KADPCM
contents.zh-CHS: 3.1 音频/32KADPCM

contents.text: CCITT Recommendation G.726 [G726] describes the algorithm recommended for conversion of a 64 kbit/s A-law or u-law PCM channel to and from a 32 kbit/s channel (this is the same algorithm as described in the deprecated G.721). The conversion is applied to the PCM stream using an Adaptive Differential Pulse Code Modulation (ADPCM) transcoding technique.
contents.zh-CHS: CCITT建议G.726[G726]描述了建议用于将64 kbit/s a律或u律PCM信道转换为32 kbit/s信道和从32 kbit/s信道转换为64 kbit/s a律或u律PCM信道的算法（这与不推荐使用的G.721中描述的算法相同）。该转换使用自适应差分脉冲编码调制（ADPCM）转码技术应用于PCM流。

contents.text: The MIME sub-type audio/32KADPCM is defined to hold binary audio data encoded in 32 kbit/s ADPCM exactly as defined by ITU-T Recommendation G.726. No header information shall be included as part of the audio data. The content transfer encoding is typically either binary or base64.
contents.zh-CHS: MIME子类型audio/32KADPCM被定义为完全按照ITU-T建议G.726的定义保存以32kbit/s ADPCM编码的二进制音频数据。不得将标题信息作为音频数据的一部分。内容传输编码通常为二进制或base64。

contents.text: An additional consideration that this document defines for clarity is the choice of little endian ordering of the four bit code words. This default ordering is defined in ITU-T Recommendation X.420 [X420] for the equivalent X.400 body part, but is also detailed below in the IANA Registration.
contents.zh-CHS: 为清晰起见，本文档定义的另一个考虑事项是选择四位码字的小端排序。该默认顺序在ITU-T建议X.420[X420]中针对等效X.400车身部件进行了定义，但在IANA注册中也有详细说明。

contents.text: 3.2 VPIM Usage
contents.zh-CHS: 3.2 VPIM使用

contents.text: The audio/32KADPCM sub-type is a primary component of the VPIM specification [VPIM]. In this context, the Content-Description and Content-Disposition headers are used to succinctly describe the contents of the audio body. As well, only the little endian bit ordering is valid. Refer to the VPIM Specifcation for proper usage.
contents.zh-CHS: 音频/32KADPCM子类型是VPIM规范[VPIM]的主要组件。在此上下文中，内容描述和内容处置头用于简洁地描述音频主体的内容。同样，只有小端位排序是有效的。有关正确使用方法，请参阅VPIM规范。

contents.text: 4. IANA Registration
contents.zh-CHS: 4. IANA注册

contents.text:
To: ietf-types@iana.org
Subject: Registration of MIME media type audio/32KADPCM
MIME media type name: audio
contents.zh-CHS: MIME媒体类型名称：音频

contents.text: MIME subtype name: 32KADPCM
contents.zh-CHS: MIME子类型名称：32KADPCM

contents.text: Required parameters: none
contents.zh-CHS: 所需参数：无

contents.text: Optional parameters: none
contents.zh-CHS: 可选参数：无

contents.text: Encoding considerations:
contents.zh-CHS: 编码注意事项：

contents.text: Binary or Base-64 generally preferred
contents.zh-CHS: 通常首选二进制或Base-64

contents.text: Security considerations:
contents.zh-CHS: 安全考虑：

contents.text: There are no known security risks with the sending or playing of raw audio data Audio data is typically interpreted only by an audio codec. Unintended information introduced into the data stream will result in noise.
contents.zh-CHS: 发送或播放原始音频数据不存在已知的安全风险。音频数据通常仅由音频编解码器解释。引入数据流的非预期信息将导致噪声。

contents.text: Interoperability considerations:
contents.zh-CHS: 互操作性注意事项：

contents.text: The four bit code word ordering within a byte may differ between existing implementations of G.726 codecs. Since this content only permits the little endian ordering, codecs that support the opposite ordering must reorder the code words before storing to or retrieving from this content type.
contents.zh-CHS: 一个字节内的四位码字顺序在G.726编解码器的现有实现之间可能有所不同。由于该内容仅允许小端排序，因此支持相反排序的编解码器必须在存储到该内容类型或从中检索之前对码字进行重新排序。

contents.text: Published specification:
contents.zh-CHS: 已发布的规范：

contents.text: ITU-T G.726 with little endian ordering
contents.zh-CHS: 具有小端序的ITU-T G.726

contents.text: Applications which use this media type:
contents.zh-CHS: 使用此媒体类型的应用程序：

contents.text: primarily voice messaging
contents.zh-CHS: 主要是语音信息

contents.text: Additional information:
contents.zh-CHS: 其他信息：

contents.text:
Magic number(s): ?
File extension(s): .726
Macintosh File Type Code(s): APCM
contents.zh-CHS: Macintosh文件类型代码：APCM

contents.text: Little Endian Ordering:
contents.zh-CHS: 小端序：

contents.text: The 4-bit code words of the G.726 encoding MUST be packed into octets/bytes as follows: the first code word (A) is placed in the four least significant bits of the first octet, with the least significant bit (LSB) of the code word (A0) in the least significant bit of the octet; the second code word (B) is placed in the four most significant bits of the first octet, with the most significant bit (MSB) of the code word (B3) in the most significant bit of the octet. Subsequent pairs of the code words shall be packed in the same way into successive octets, with the first code word of each pair placed in the least significant four bits of the octet. It is preferred that the voice sample be extended with silence such that the encoded value comprises an even number of code words. However, if the voice sample comprises an odd number of code words, then the last code word shall be discarded.
contents.zh-CHS: G.726编码的4位码字必须按如下方式打包成八位字节/字节：第一个码字（A）放在第一个八位字节的四个最低有效位，码字（A0）的最低有效位（LSB）放在八位字节的最低有效位；第二个码字（B）位于第一个八位字节的四个最高有效位，码字（B3）的最高有效位（MSB）位于八位字节的最高有效位。随后的码字对应以相同方式打包成连续的八位字节，每对码字的第一个码字放在八位字节的最低有效四位。优选地，语音样本以静默方式扩展，使得编码值包括偶数个码字。但是，如果语音样本包含奇数个码字，则应丢弃最后一个码字。

contents.text: 32K ADPCM / Octet Mapping
contents.zh-CHS: 32K ADPCM/八位组映射
